content.prompt: The Columbian Exchange involved which of the following new connections in the era 1450â€“1750?

choices.label: European food to the Western Hemisphere; Western Hemisphere diseases to Europe; African population to Europe

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
